items.storedescription:
With your DA polisher you can use the Nanoskin Autoscrub Fine Foam 6" pad to easily remove light industrial fallout, mild pollutants and other embedded contaminants from automotive paint. This unique pad also works to remove contaminants on glass, moldings and plastic using this Nanoskin AutoScrub paint decontamination product. 

This procedure is an important step in preparing for the paint correction and polishing stage. In the past, professional detailers used clay bars and completed the work by hand. Clay bars are effective, but they eventually become overloaded with contaminants and must be discarded. Unlike the clay bar, the Nanoskin Autoscrub Foam Pads can be cleaned by simply rinsing off the accumulated contaminants with water. If dropped on the ground, simply rinse clean the patented rubber polymer side of the Autoscrub foam pad, and you are ready to continue using it.
items.storedisplayname2: Nanoskin AutoScrub 6" Fine Grade Foam Pad for DA Polisher

items.storedescription: Regardless of how clean you think your paint is, there are still contaminants stuck on the paint that you need to remove before waxing or polishing your paint. Paint Cleaning Clay leaves behind an ultra-smooth surface that will make your wax adhere better and last longer.  It also makes the wax much easier to buff out. Paint Cleaning Clay is safe for all paint and also works great on glass to get it squeaky clean.  Paint Cleaning Clay requires Speed Shine to be used as a lubricant for proper application. Simply spray your paint surface & slide the clay across the paint. No need to rub hard. Wipe dry & your finish is like a baby's butt without the streaks. Follow up with our paint sealants or waxes.               You owe it to yourself to try Paint Cleaning Clay and Speed Shine!!!

Grit Guard Dolly for the Grit Guard Wash Bucket System
Works great for 5 gallon tank sprayers as well

*Tank and Sprayer not included

Brass heavy duty adjustable pattern nozzle can handle harsh daily use with ease. No plastic to break. Machined parts provide very precise patterns from fine cone shaped mist to a pencil thin stream that can reach approximately 35?.

Tired of breaking your plastic nozzle for the pressurized stainless steel tanks? Upgrade today to the Brass Nozzle for Pressurized Tanks; which is much more durable than the plastic nozzles. Good for up to 250psi, far exceeding the tank rating of 135psi and the 150psi rating of the plastic version!
90 degree elbow w/ 1/4 flare & 1/4? barb used to connect 1/4? hoses to our tank sprayers. Nut and barb are stainless steel.

TriggerJet Replacement trigger fits A1105N. Easy to replace, just use a small nail or an awl and tap the push pin put, then slide trigger towards the nozzle and lift off. Set new trigger in position and use original push pin to secure. Please note: as picture shows, if you wish to retain the gray trigger lock, you must use the one from the old trigger.
This is a Replacement Tank Lid that will work with either the 3 or 5 Gallon SS Pressurized Tank Sprayers.
items.storedisplayname2: SS Pressurized Sprayer Replacement Tank Lid

items.storedescription: This is a 3 Gallon SS Pressurized Tank Sprayer. The hose that comes with this sprayer is 15'. Max of 130 PSI.

The Replacement Hose for 3 Gallon Sprayer (15') which can also be used on the 5 Gallon Sprayer. This hose includes the clip attachment and nozzle so all you need to do is attach it and start spraying.
This is a 5 Gallon SS Pressurized Sprayer, and includes a 25' hose.
Nozzle assembly replacement for 5 Gallon Pressurized Sprayer.
items.storedisplayname2: 5 Gallon SS Pressurized Sprayer Nozzle Assy.

items.storedescription: The AirForce Blaster Side Kick is a high performance portable Car Detailing and Tinting dryer. 1.3 HP motor and 18,000 ft per min of warm, dry, filtered air. Helps to blast the water out of all those hard to reach areas on your vehicles.
The hand-held Poly II Sprayer is light weight so it will not weigh you down on the job. An enlarged opening makes for easy refills and cleaning. Holds 1.25 liters.

items.outofstockmessage: This item has been discontinued by the manufacturer. Sku will be inactivated once the inventory across the company is depleted
items.storedescription: Replacement Sprayer Top for the Poly II sprayer (A1205). The only difference between this top and the one that comes on the Poly II Sprayer is the color.

items.storedisplayname2: Replacement Top For Poly II Sprayer

items.storedescription: The Performax Sprayer is a lightweight, durable and very affordable pump-up hand sprayer. Holds 48 ounces (1.5 quarts).
The Impact Sprayer is a pressurized pump-up sprayer to offers just the right amount of pressure for tint installation. Holds 48 ounces (1.5 quarts).

This replacement nozzle is for the Impact Jr (A1211I). Unfortunately, sometimes when your sprayer drops to the floor, it lands on the nozzle and breaks leaving your sprayer unusable. This nozzle puts your sprayer back to work for you.
The Impact Rebuild Kit will provide you with all of the necessary seals to replace all the seals on the Impact Sprayer (A1211I).
The Chapin Poly Shut-off Valve requires A1212N to work properly.
items.storedisplayname2: Chapin Poly Shut-off Valve (requires part# A1212N)

items.storedescription: Chapin Poly Shut-off Nozzle to be used with A1212.
Use in-line with any pressurized sprayer with a hose.
items.storedisplayname2: In-Line Filter for Sprayers with Hose

items.storedescription: Please note: this item is ONLY the Sprayer Bottle. If you need a sprayer head to work with this bottle, we suggest items B406 (Blue) and/or B406T (Red) as suitable sprayer heads.

The 32oz Bottle is made from a high-density polyethylene (#2 plastic) that is designed for cleaning agents, laundry detergents, bleaching agents, shampoos, and washing soaps. Volume markings range from 3oz (100ml) up to 32oz (946ml). Please note: This item is ONLY the Sprayer Bottle. If you need a sprayer head to work with this bottle, we suggest items B406 (Blue) and/or B406T (Red) and B407T (Zep Trigger) as suitable sprayer heads.

items.storedescription: Unique, Double-Action Trigger for a constant fine spray causing less hand fatigue. The Blue Mercury Pro Sprayer (1 liter) sprays twice for each squeeze of the trigger, therefore you get twice as much fluid where you need it with each squeeze.

Unique, Double-Action Trigger for a constant fine spray causing less hand fatigue. The Red Mercury Pro Sprayer (1 Liter) sprays twice for each squeeze of the trigger. Plus the added feature; this unit will even spray when held sideways or upside down.
Green Mercury Sprayer (1 Liter)
32 Oz. Bottle without sprayer

items.storedescription: Recently upgraded with high volume triggers, these are the best spray bottles to use for PPF installation. The high volume sprayer (3.3 cc per stroke) will even reduce the amount of dust and debris in your installations by reducing the amount of time the painted surface is exposed to the air while wetting it before laying the film onto the car.
items.storedisplayname2: 32 Ounce Spray Bottle and High Volume Trigger (Trigger color may vary)

items.storedescription: Recently upgraded with high volume triggers, these are the best spray bottles to use for PPF installation. The high volume sprayer will save you installation time by more effectively washing out slip solution around the edges.

items.storedescription: 15' Straight hose w/ Stainless QC: includes quick disconnect and plastic spray nozzle. The 15' Straight Hose is a 1/4'' Striper Hose (STH-1/4'') with a maximum capacity of 300psi. THIS HOSE SETUP WILL ONLY WORK WITH THE NEWER STYLE 5 GALLON TINT KEG. For most other tank sprayers, you will need the Tint Keg Liquid Post w/ Popit in order to use the hose.
items.storedisplayname2: 15' Straight Hose w/ Stainless Quick Connect

items.storedescription: Ribbed Barrel for Trigger-Jet spray guns (A1105N). This has the 1/4?NPT female threads integrated into the barrel. Please note: When swapping this part, look into the side that threaded onto the spray gun and pull out the small gasket found inside as the new one does not include a gasket. You can pluck this out with a pen or small pick, then just place into the new barrel and push it into place.
Tint Keg Inline Filter

The 5 Gallon SS Pressurized Sprayer Hose Assembly (25') that will work with either the 5 gallon or 3 gallon tanks. This hose includes the clip attachment and nozzle so all you need to do is attach it and start spraying.

items.storedescription: The hose swivel, fits 1/4? X 3/8? hose and has 1/4npt male threads. Great replacement for non swivel type hose barbs. Keeps hose from getting tangled. Comes with rubber stress relief that when pushed forward snaps into place on collar.

Road film, oil, tar, grease, water spots, and more bonds to glass and are difficult to remove. Use our clay to break their grip.

  • Eliminate heavy road film, tar, bug jerky, and tough water spots
  • Clean windows are a matter of style and safety
  • 3.5 ounce, 100 gram bar will clean dozens of windows
Triggerjet Strainer 100 Mesh
items.custitem_sca_tool_type: Window Tint Tools, Paint Protection Film Tools

items.storedescription: To obtain a perfect and even foam pattern for PPF bonding, we recommend our pressure pump container EasyPump Foam with special head. The foaming degree is adjustable on three levels - SNOW FOAM (solid foam), MOUSSE FOAM (medium foam) and HYDRO FOAM (liquid foam). The capacity of the bottle is 1 liter and is therefore perfect for mixing your individual PPF liquid. The Ergo-Grip enables fatigue-free working. Quality Made in Germany. Three levels adjustable: SNOW FOAM (solid foam), MOUSSE FOAM (medium strength foam), HYDRO FOAM (liquid foam).
items.custitem_sca_tool_type: Window Tint Tools, Paint Protection Film Tools

items.storedescription: The 915e Power Steamer is a new for 2020 updated version of the old 915. The 915e is a pressurized steam system that supplies steam at the touch of a button, and is Wagner's most powerful paint protection remover, vinyl remover, and so much more! It cleans without chemicals, and will never leave a messy residue.
